resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/74984</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74984</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>eddb7e8e-c98f-4105-b97b-96badca84e08#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az energiaáramlás a társulásban</string>
            <string language="en">The flow of energy in association</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Fluß von Energie in der Verbindung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'écoulement de l'énergie dans l'association</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O fluxo da energia na associação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il flusso di energia nell'associazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ροή της ενέργειας στην ένωση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El flujo de la energía en la asociación</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az egyirányú energiaáramlás szemléltetése a társulásban (fényenergia megkötése, a termelők szerves anyagainak sorsa a társulásban, a hő mint energiaveszteség)</string>
            <string language="en">Demonstration of one-way flow of energy in association (binding of lightning energy, destiny of the growe's organic tissues in association, the hot like loss of power)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">energiaáramlás,  hőveszteség,  </string>
            <string language="en">flow of energy, loos of heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Demonstration des Einwegflusses von Energie in der
Verbindung (Binden von Blitzenergie, von Schicksal der organischen 
Gewebe der growes in der Verbindung, das heiße wie Verlust der 
Energie)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Démonstration d'écoulement à sens unique 
d'énergie dans l'association (lier d'énergie de foudre, de destin 
des tissus organiques des growe dans l'association, le chaud comme la 
perte de puissance)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Demonstração do fluxo de sentido único da 
energia na associação (ligar da energia do relâmpago, do destiny 
dos tecidos orgânicos dos growe na associação, o quente como a 
perda da potência)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dimostrazione di flusso unidirezionale di energia
nell'associazione (legarsi dell'energia del lampo, del destino dei 
tessuti organici dei growe nell'associazione, il caldo come perdita di
potenza)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίδειξη της μονόδρομης ροής της ενέργειας στην ένωση
(συσχετισμός της ενέργειας αστραπής, πεπρωμένο των οργανικών 
ιστών των growe στην ένωση, ο καυτός όπως την απώλεια 
δύναμης)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Demostración del flujo unidireccional de la 
energía en la asociación (el atar de la energía del relámpago, del
destino de los tejidos finos orgánicos de los growe en la 
asociación, el caliente como la pérdida de potencia)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fluß von Energie, Klos der Hitze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écoulement de l'énergie, WC de la chaleur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fluxo da energia, loos do calor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">flusso di energia, loos di calore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ροή της ενέργειας, τουαλέτες της θερμότητας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">flujo de la energía, loos del calor</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>74984</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
